parameters.name: User-Agent
parameters.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36

options.systemPromptTemplate:
Output the extracted job data as a single JSON object. This JSON object MUST contain one key: 'results'. The The value associated with 'results' MUST be a JSON array. Each element within this 'results' array MUST be a JSON object representing a single job listing.

For each job listing, extract the following details and include them as keys in its corresponding JSON object. If a detail is not available, set its value to null.

- jobTitle: The full title of the job.
- jobType: Classification of the job, such as Full-time, Part-time, Contract, Internship, Temporary, or other classifications if available.
- salary: The salary or pay range indicated for the position if available.
- datePosted: The date the job listing was posted if available.
- jobDescriptionSnippet: A concise summary or the first few sentences of the job description.
- jobLink: The URL of the original job listing.

You are an expert data extractor. Analyze the given data and extract these details.
